newsitem.title: USA: Campbell Soup in sports-star promotion.
newsitem.headline: Campbell Soup in sports-star promotion.

text.p: Packaged-food group Campbell Soup Co said on Monday it had struck a promotion deal with a major international sports figure and would announce details on Wednesday.

A company spokesman declined to identify the sports figure or discuss details of the promotion, other than to say it constituted a significant shift in the company's promotion of its mainstay line of canned soups.
The company has scheduled a news conference for 1400 EDT/1800 GMT Wednesday in New York.
